title: Semen Padang F.C. U-21
text:
Semen Padang FC U-20 is an Indonesian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team located in Indarung, <a href="Padang%2C%20Indonesia">Padang</a>, <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>. They are the reserve team from Semen Padang. Their nickname are "Kerbau Sirah Mudo".
History.
They became the runner-up in the <a href="2011%20Indonesia%20Super%20League%20U-21">2011 Indonesia Super League U-21</a>. On 19 October 2014, Semen Padang U-21 won the <a href="2014%20Indonesia%20Super%20League%20U-21">2014 Indonesia Super League U-21</a> after defeating Sriwijaya U-21 4–0 in the final.
2019 squad.
"The following players are eligible for <a href="Liga%201%20U-19">Liga 1 U-20</a> in the current <a href="2019%20Liga%201%20U-20">2019 Liga 1 U-20</a> season."
